content:
Hi! I’m a Mechanical Engineering PhD candidate in Carnegie Mellon University. I am co-advised by Carmel Majidi and Burak Ozdoganlar.
My research interests include soft electronics, soft robotics, advanced manufacturing and machine learning.
Contact: bugraozutemiz@gmail.com
